event.description: Short name for the physical event this message was for, usually the same as the donation tracker.

desc.description: Describes the way the timer has changed: started, paused, resumed, finished, reset, edited, team_finished, team_undid_finish.

teamID.description: If event is applicable to a team, lists their UUID here. This UUID is also used in the routing key.

timer.description: Current copy of the timer object from nodecg-speedcontrol.
